title: Just some PESU data I found

comments.body: For those confused, the "PES University" under "Where they work" also includes TA/RA positions that students have added to their LinkedIn.
What do you do for a living?
Are you fr? You were the one harshly judging new students here for not having employable skills (Nothing against you though)

Worked for 2 years, now going for Masters.

So yes technically I *am* unemployed ðŸ˜­
Lol I'm aware, I was joking.
Nahh boss u gonna get the best cllg for masters nd ll make pesu proud again

TA - Teaching Assistant, RA - Research Assistant
